name: Greater Obsidian Elemental
resistance: cold, fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

traits.name: Brute
traits.desc: A melee weapon attack deals one extra die of its damage when the obsidian elemental hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Death Throes
traits.desc: When the obsidian elemental dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 42 (12d6) slashing damage and 42 (12d6) fire damage on a failed saving throw, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Molten Glass
traits.desc: A creature that hits the obsidian elemental with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The obsidian elemental makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (4d8 + 5) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.
